title: The Minister's Wife
overview: Rafael, a young man from the provinces, works as a waiter in a resort and helps himself economically having sex for money with rich older women. During a bomb threat, he is discovered in bed with one of the guest, Leonor Marchioness of Montenegro, and he is fired as a consequence.  The Marchioness of Montenegro is an aging aristocrat, ruined economically, but still with wealthy and influential friends.
